coupon.title: 2 for $5.99 Each on Select Items
coupon.description: Choose Any 2 or More: Medium 2-Topping Pizza, Oven Baked Sandwich, Stuffed Cheesy Bread, 8-piece Chicken, or Pasta in a Dish For Just $5.99 Each. All Locations. Limited time offer.
